sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.REQ_DVSN_CD ,A.ACP_YR ,A.CVPT_ACP_NO ,A.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO ,A.ACP_YR||'-민원-'||A.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO AS ACP_NO ,A.CVPT_KND_CD ,A.TIT_NM ,DECODE(A.REQR_KND_CD,'1',A.CVPTR_NM,'2',A.RPST_PEN_NM,'3',A.RPST_PEN_NM,'4',A.CVPTR_NM) AS CVPTR_NM ,TO_CHAR(A.ACP_DH,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ACP_DH ,TO_CHAR(C.FNL_DTB_DH,'YYYYMMDD') AS FNL_DTB_DH ,A.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD ,A.REQR_KND_CD ,F_DPT_INFO(C.HNDL_DPT_CD,'1') AS HNDL_DPT_NM ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(C.HNDL_CHGR_ID,'2') AS HNDL_CHGR_NM ,F_DPT_INFO(A.ACP_DPT_CD,'1') AS ACP_DPT_NM ,F_CODE_NM('1000056',A.ACP_RUT_CD) AS ACP_RUT_NM ,TO_CHAR(A.CVPT_WDW_DH,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CVPT_WDW_DH , F_CODE_NM('1000599',C.CVPT_KND_DVSN_CD) AS CVPT_KND_DVSN_NM ,( SELECT F_CODE_NM('1000754', S3.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD) FROM TBCSPDCP205L S3 WHERE (S3.REQ_DVSN_CD, S3.ACP_YR, S3.CVPT_ACP_NO, S3.SRNO) IN ( SELECT S4.REQ_DVSN_CD,S4.ACP_YR,S4.CVPT_ACP_NO,MIN(S4.SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP205L S4 WHERE A.REQ_DVSN_CD = S4.REQ_DVSN_CD AND A.ACP_YR = S4.ACP_YR AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = S4.CVPT_ACP_NO GROUP BY S4.REQ_DVSN_CD,S4.ACP_YR,S4.CVPT_ACP_NO ) ) AS CVPT_HNLD_DVSN_NM ,( SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(S2.ONR_APV_CMPT_DH, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') + NVL( S1.USR_DFN_TXT_2, 30), 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM TBDCMACM013C S1, TBCSPDCP205L D3, TBCSPDCP301M S2 WHERE S1.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000754' AND S1.CD != '000000000' AND S1.CD = D3.CVPT_HNDL_DVSN_CD AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = D3.REQ_DVSN_CD AND A.ACP_YR = D3.ACP_YR AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = D3.CVPT_ACP_NO AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = S2.REQ_DVSN_CD AND A.ACP_YR = S2.ACP_YR AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = S2.CVPT_ACP_NO AND S2.CVPT_IFM_DVSN_CD = 'C' AND S2.CVPT_OPM_APV_HNDL_STA_CD = '30' AND (D3.REQ_DVSN_CD, D3.CVPT_ACP_NO, D3.ACP_YR, D3.SRNO ) IN ( SELECT Z.REQ_DVSN_CD, Z.CVPT_ACP_NO, Z.ACP_YR, MIN(Z.SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP205L Z WHERE A.REQ_DVSN_CD = Z.REQ_DVSN_CD AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = Z.CVPT_ACP_NO AND A.ACP_YR = Z.ACP_YR GROUP BY Z.REQ_DVSN_CD, Z.CVPT_ACP_NO, Z.ACP_YR )) AS HNDL_LIMIT__DT ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(C.BAI_CHGR_ID,'2') AS BAI_CHGR_NM FROM TBCSPDCP101M A ,TBCSPDCP102M B ,TBCSPDCP201M C WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = '1' AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = B.REQ_DVSN_CD AND A.ACP_YR = B.ACP_YR AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = B.CVPT_ACP_NO AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = C.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND A.ACP_YR = C.ACP_YR(+) AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = C.CVPT_ACP_NO(+)
AND A.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN ('10','21')
AND (A.ACP_DPT_CD = #strDPT_CD# OR C.HNDL_DPT_CD = #strDPT_CD#)
AND TO_CHAR(A.ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD') >= #strACP_DHS#
AND TO_CHAR(A.ACP_DH,'YYYYMMDD') <= #strACP_DHE#
AND A.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = #strCVPT_HNDL_STA_CD#
AND A.TIT_NM LIKE '%'||#strTIT_NM#||'%'
AND B.CVPT_SBT LIKE '%'||#strTIT_NM#||'%'
AND A.ACP_YR = #strACP_YR#
AND A.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO = #strRM_CVPT_ACP_NO#
AND (A.CVPTR_NM LIKE '%'||#strCVPTR_NM#||'%' OR A.RPST_PEN_NM LIKE '%'||#strCVPTR_NM#||'%')
AND ( (C.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND C.HNDL_DPT_CD <> #strDPT_CD#) OR (C.HNDL_DPT_CD = #strDPT_CD# AND C.HNDL_CHGR_ID IS NOT NULL) OR (A.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD IN ('70','80')))
AND (C.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NULL OR (C.HNDL_DPT_CD = #strDPT_CD# AND C.HNDL_CHGR_ID IS NULL)) AND A.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD NOT IN('70','80')
AND A.SMG_CVPT_APL_NO = #strSMG_CVPT_APL_NO#
ORDER BY A.ACP_YR DESC,A.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO DESC

SELECT A.REQ_DVSN_CD ,A.ACP_YR ,A.CVPT_ACP_NO ,A.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO ,DECODE(A.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO,NULL,'',A.ACP_YR||'-민원-'||A.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO) AS ACP_NO ,A.CVPT_KND_CD ,A.TIT_NM ,DECODE(A.REQR_KND_CD,'1',A.CVPTR_NM,'2',A.RPST_PEN_NM,'3',A.RPST_PEN_NM,'4',A.CVPTR_NM) AS CVPTR_NM ,TO_CHAR(A.ACP_DH,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ACP_DH ,F_DPT_INFO(B.HNDL_DPT_CD,'1') AS HNDL_DPT_NM ,B.HNDL_DPT_CD ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(B.HNDL_CHGR_ID,'2') AS HNDL_CHGR_NM ,B.HNDL_CHGR_ID ,A.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD ,F_CODE_NM('1000361',A.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD) AS CVPT_HNDL_STA_NM ,F_DPT_INFO(A.ACP_DPT_CD,'1') AS ACP_DPT_NM FROM TBCSPDCP101M A ,TBCSPDCP201M B ,( SELECT A.CVPTR_NM, A.RPST_PEN_NM, A.HPN FROM TBCSPDCP101M A WHERE A.REQ_DVSN_CD = #strREQ_DVSN_CD# AND A.ACP_YR = #strACP_YR# AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = #strCVPT_ACP_NO# ) C WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = '1' AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = B.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND A.ACP_YR = B.ACP_YR(+) AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = B.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND A.REQR_KND_CD <> '4' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT '' FROM TBCSPDCP101M Z WHERE Z.REQ_DVSN_CD = #strREQ_DVSN_CD# AND Z.ACP_YR = #strACP_YR# AND Z.CVPT_ACP_NO = #strCVPT_ACP_NO# AND Z.REQ_DVSN_CD = A.REQ_DVSN_CD AND Z.ACP_YR = A.ACP_YR AND Z.CVPT_ACP_NO = A.CVPT_ACP_NO )
AND A.CVPTR_NM = C.CVPTR_NM AND A.HPN = C.HPN
AND A.RPST_PEN_NM = C.RPST_PEN_NM AND A.HPN = C.HPN
AND A.RPST_PEN_NM = C.RPST_PEN_NM AND A.HPN = C.HPN
AND A.CVPTR_NM = C.CVPTR_NM AND A.HPN = C.HPN

SELECT A.REQ_DVSN_CD ,A.ACP_YR ,A.CVPT_ACP_NO ,TO_CHAR(B.FRT_REGI_DH,'YYYYMMDD') AS DTB_DT ,B.DTB_DPT_CD ,F_DPT_INFO(B.DTB_DPT_CD, '1') AS DTB_DPT_NM ,B.DTB_PEN_ID ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(B.DTB_PEN_ID,'2') AS DTB_PEN_NM ,B.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD ,B.HNDL_DPT_CD ,F_DPT_INFO(B.HNDL_DPT_CD, '1') AS HNDL_DPT_NM ,B.HNDL_CHGR_ID ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(B.HNDL_CHGR_ID,'2') AS HNDL_CHGR_NM ,B.RDTB_RQS_RSN ,B.CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO ,B.BAI_CHGR_ID ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(B.BAI_CHGR_ID,'2') AS BAI_CHGR_NM FROM TBCSPDCP101M A ,TBCSPDCP202H B WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = '1' AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = B.REQ_DVSN_CD AND A.ACP_YR = B.ACP_YR AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = B.CVPT_ACP_NO AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = #strREQ_DVSN_CD# AND A.ACP_YR = #strACP_YR# AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = #strCVPT_ACP_NO# ORDER BY CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO ASC

SELECT A.REQ_DVSN_CD ,A.ACP_YR ,A.CVPT_ACP_NO ,A.ACP_YR||'-민원-'||A.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO AS ACP_NO ,F_CODE_NM('1000047',A.CVPT_KND_CD) AS CVPT_KND_NM ,A.CVPT_KND_CD ,F_DPT_INFO(A.ACP_DPT_CD,'1')||'/'||F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(A.RCEP_ID,'2') AS ACP_NM ,ACP_DPT_CD ,TO_CHAR(A.ACP_DH,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ACP_DH ,A.ACP_RUT_CD ,F_CODE_NM('1000056',A.ACP_RUT_CD) AS ACP_RUT_NM ,F_CODE_NM('1000358',A.REQR_KND_CD) AS REQR_KND_NM ,DECODE(#strREQR_KND_CD#,'1',A.CVPTR_NM,'2',A.RPST_PEN_NM,'3',A.RPST_PEN_NM,'4',A.CVPTR_NM) AS CVPTR_NM ,A.OPEN_YN ,DECODE(A.CVPT_WDW_DH,NULL,'N','Y') AS WIDW_YN ,DECODE(A.ZCD,NULL,'','(우)'||A.ZCD||' '||A.AD||' '||A.DTL_AD) AS AD ,A.TNB ,A.HPN ,CASE WHEN A.ACP_RUT_CD = '8' THEN F_CODE_NM('1000089',A.RSLT_NTF_WAY_CD) WHEN A.ACP_RUT_CD <> '8' AND A.RSLT_NTF_WAY_CD = '003' THEN F_CODE_NM('1000089',A.RSLT_NTF_WAY_CD) ELSE '홈페이지+'||F_CODE_NM('1000089',A.RSLT_NTF_WAY_CD) END AS RSLT_NTF_WAY_NM ,C.CLM_NM ,C.WRK_PLAC_NM ,C.TNB AS CLM_TNB ,DECODE(C.ZCD,NULL,'','(우)'||C.ZCD||' '||C.AD||' '||C.DTL_AD) AS CLM_AD ,B.CVPT_TXT ,D.HNDL_DPT_CD ,D.HNDL_CHGR_ID ,A.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD ,A.DOC_ID ,A.TIT_NM ,A.SMG_CVPT_APL_NO ,A.SMG_FRT_CVPT_APL_GCC_ORG_CD ,TO_CHAR(A.CVPT_WDW_DH,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CVPT_WDW_DH ,A.CVPT_WDW_RSN ,CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(FILE_ID) FROM ECM_FILE_LIST_VIEW2 X WHERE A.DOC_ID = X.DOC_ID ) > 0 THEN '첨부파일 있음' ELSE '첨부파일 없음' END AS ATCH_YN ,D.BAI_CHGR_ID FROM TBCSPDCP101M A ,TBCSPDCP102M B ,TBCSPDCP103M C ,TBCSPDCP201M D WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD ='1' AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = #strREQ_DVSN_CD# AND A.ACP_YR = #strACP_YR# AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = #strCVPT_ACP_NO# AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = B.REQ_DVSN_CD AND A.ACP_YR = B.ACP_YR AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = B.CVPT_ACP_NO AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = C.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND A.ACP_YR = C.ACP_YR(+) AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = C.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = D.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND A.ACP_YR = D.ACP_YR(+) AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = D.CVPT_ACP_NO(+)

SELECT DPT_CD, DPT_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M WHERE DPT_CD LIKE '071%' AND USE_YN ='Y' AND DPT_CD NOT IN ('071000') UNION SELECT DPT_CD, DPT_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M WHERE DPT_CD LIKE '062%' AND USE_YN ='Y' AND DPT_CD NOT IN ('062000')

SELECT USR_ID,USR_NAM ,DPT_CD FROM TBDCMACM001M WHERE DPT_CD LIKE '071%' AND DPT_CD NOT IN ('071000') AND RSG_DT IS NULL AND RQS_STA_CD = '3' AND BAI_USR_YN = 'Y' UNION SELECT USR_ID,USR_NAM ,DPT_CD FROM TBDCMACM001M WHERE DPT_CD LIKE '062%' AND DPT_CD NOT IN ('062000') AND RAL_BLT_DIV_CD IN ('062510','062610','062710','062810') AND RSG_DT IS NULL AND RQS_STA_CD = '3' AND BAI_USR_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY USR_NAM ASC

SELECT USR_ID,USR_NAM ,DPT_CD FROM TBDCMACM001M WHERE DPT_CD LIKE '071%' AND DPT_CD NOT IN ('071000') AND RSG_DT IS NULL AND RQS_STA_CD = '3' AND BAI_USR_YN = 'Y' AND CNB < '7000' UNION SELECT USR_ID,USR_NAM ,DPT_CD FROM TBDCMACM001M WHERE DPT_CD LIKE '062%' AND DPT_CD NOT IN ('062000') AND RAL_BLT_DIV_CD IN ('062510','062610','062710','062810') AND RSG_DT IS NULL AND RQS_STA_CD = '3' AND BAI_USR_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY USR_NAM ASC
SELECT CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD /*진행상태*/ FROM TBCSPDCP101M WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = #strREQ_DVSN_CD# AND ACP_YR = #strACP_YR# AND CVPT_ACP_NO = #strCVPT_ACP_NO#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TBCSPDCP101M SET CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = #HNDL_STA_CD# ,CVPT_KND_CD = #CVPT_KND_CD# ,FNL_USR_ID = #FNL_USR_ID# ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# ,FNL_MNU_ID = #FNL_MNU_ID# ,FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = #REQ_DVSN_CD# AND ACP_YR = #ACP_YR# AND CVPT_ACP_NO = #CVPT_ACP_NO#

UPDATE TBCSPDCP101M SET CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = #HNDL_STA_CD# ,FNL_USR_ID = #FNL_USR_ID# ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# ,FNL_MNU_ID = #FNL_MNU_ID# ,FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = #REQ_DVSN_CD# AND ACP_YR = #ACP_YR# AND CVPT_ACP_NO = #CVPT_ACP_NO#

INSERT INTO TBCSPDCP202H ( REQ_DVSN_CD ,ACP_YR ,CVPT_ACP_NO ,CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO ,DTB_DPT_CD ,DTB_PEN_ID ,CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD ,HNDL_DPT_CD ,HNDL_CHGR_ID ,RDTB_RQS_RSN ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ,BAI_CHGR_ID ) VALUES ( #REQ_DVSN_CD# ,#ACP_YR# ,#CVPT_ACP_NO# ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO),0)+1 FROM TBCSPDCP202H WHERE 1=1 AND REQ_DVSN_CD = #REQ_DVSN_CD# AND ACP_YR = #ACP_YR# AND CVPT_ACP_NO = #CVPT_ACP_NO# ) ,F_USR_INFO(#S_CNB#,'5') ,F_USR_INFO(#S_CNB#,'1') ,#HNDL_STA_CD# ,#HNDL_DPT_CD# ,#HNDL_CHGR_ID# ,#RDTB_RQS_RSN# ,F_USR_INFO(#S_CNB#,'1') ,#FNL_USR_ID# ,#FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# ,#FNL_MNU_ID# ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE ,#BAI_CHGR_ID# )
sqlMap.insert: MERGE INTO TBCSPDCP201M A USING ( SELECT #REQ_DVSN_CD# AS REQ_DVSN_CD ,#ACP_YR# AS ACP_YR ,#CVPT_ACP_NO# AS CVPT_ACP_NO FROM DUAL ) B ON ( A.REQ_DVSN_CD = B.REQ_DVSN_CD AND A.ACP_YR = B.ACP_YR AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = B.CVPT_ACP_NO ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET FNL_DTB_DPT_CD = F_USR_INFO(#S_CNB#,'5') ,FNL_DTB_PEN_ID = F_USR_INFO(#S_CNB#,'1') ,FNL_DTB_DH = SYSDATE ,HNDL_DPT_CD = #HNDL_DPT_CD# ,HNDL_CHGR_ID = #HNDL_CHGR_ID# ,BAI_CHGR_ID = #BAI_CHGR_ID# ,FNL_USR_ID = #FNL_USR_ID# ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# ,FNL_MNU_ID = #FNL_MNU_ID# ,FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( REQ_DVSN_CD ,ACP_YR ,CVPT_ACP_NO ,FNL_DTB_DPT_CD ,FNL_DTB_PEN_ID ,FNL_DTB_DH ,HNDL_DPT_CD ,HNDL_CHGR_ID ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ,BAI_CHGR_ID ) VALUES ( #REQ_DVSN_CD# ,#ACP_YR# ,#CVPT_ACP_NO# ,F_USR_INFO(#S_CNB#,'5') ,F_USR_INFO(#S_CNB#,'1') ,SYSDATE ,#HNDL_DPT_CD# ,#HNDL_CHGR_ID# ,F_USR_INFO(#S_CNB#,'1') ,#FNL_USR_ID# ,#FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# ,#FNL_MNU_ID# ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE ,#BAI_CHGR_ID# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT RANK_NM_2 AS PST_NM,USR_NAM ,USR_ID FROM TBDCMACM001M WHERE RAL_BLT_DIV_CD = CASE WHEN #strDPT_CD# LIKE '06%' THEN SUBSTR( #strDPT_CD#,1,4)||'10' ELSE #strDPT_CD# END AND RSG_DT IS NULL AND RQS_STA_CD = '3' AND BAI_USR_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY USR_NAM ASC
SELECT FNL_DTB_DPT_CD, FNL_DTB_PEN_ID FROM TBCSPDCP201M WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = #REQ_DVSN_CD# AND ACP_YR = #ACP_YR# AND CVPT_ACP_NO = #CVPT_ACP_NO#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TBCSPDCP201M SET HNDL_DPT_CD = #HNDL_DPT_CD# ,HNDL_CHGR_ID ='' ,FNL_USR_ID = #FNL_USR_ID# ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD# ,FNL_MNU_ID = #FNL_MNU_ID# ,FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = #REQ_DVSN_CD# AND ACP_YR = #ACP_YR# AND CVPT_ACP_NO = #CVPT_ACP_NO#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD /*진행상태*/ , B.HNDL_DPT_CD , B.HNDL_CHGR_ID ,F_CODE_NM('1000361',A.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD) AS CVPT_HNDL_STA_NM FROM TBCSPDCP101M A, TBCSPDCP201M B WHERE A.REQ_DVSN_CD = #REQ_DVSN_CD# AND A.ACP_YR = #ACP_YR# AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = #CVPT_ACP_NO# AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = B.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND A.ACP_YR = B.ACP_YR(+) AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = B.CVPT_ACP_NO(+)

SELECT D2.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO AS CVPT_ACP_NO ,NVL(F_DPT_INFO (D1.HNDL_DPT_CD, '1'),' ') AS HNDL_DPT_NM ,TO_CHAR(D2.ACP_DH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ACP_DT ,D2.TIT_NM ,NVL(DECODE(D2.REQR_KND_CD,'1',D2.CVPTR_NM,'2',D2.RPST_PEN_NM,'3',D2.RPST_PEN_NM,'4',D2.CVPTR_NM),' ') AS CVPTR_NM ,F_DPT_INFO (D2.ACP_DPT_CD, '1') AS ACP_DPT_NM ,NVL(F_USR_INFO_BY_ID (D1.HNDL_CHGR_ID, '2'),' ') AS HNDL_CHGR_NM ,' ' AS RMK ,' ' AS U ,F_CODE_NM ('1000056', D2.ACP_RUT_CD) AS ACP_RUT_NM ,' ' AS AA FROM TBCSPDCP101M D2 ,(SELECT * FROM TBCSPDCP202H D1 WHERE HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND (D1.REQ_DVSN_CD, D1.ACP_YR, D1.CVPT_ACP_NO,D1.CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) IN (SELECT S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO,MIN(CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP202H S1 WHERE S1.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL GROUP BY S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO) ) D1 WHERE D2.REQ_DVSN_CD ='1' AND D2.REQ_DVSN_CD = D1.REQ_DVSN_CD AND D2.ACP_YR = D1.ACP_YR AND D2.CVPT_ACP_NO = D1.CVPT_ACP_NO AND TO_CHAR(D1.FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYYMMDD') = #strDt# AND D1.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL
AND D2.ACP_DPT_CD IN ('071100','071110')
AND D2.ACP_DPT_CD IN ('071100','071110')
AND D2.ACP_DPT_CD = #strDPT_CD#
AND (D1.REQ_DVSN_CD, D1.ACP_YR, D1.CVPT_ACP_NO,D1.CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) IN (SELECT S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO,MIN(CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP202H S1 WHERE S1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD IN ('20','30') AND TO_CHAR(S1.FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYYMMDD') = #strDt# AND S1.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL
AND S1.DTB_DPT_CD IN ('071100','071110')
AND S1.DTB_DPT_CD IN ('071100','071110')
AND S1.DTB_DPT_CD = #strDPT_CD#
GROUP BY S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO) ORDER BY D1.CVPT_ACP_NO DESC

SELECT '대전사무소 : '||CNT1||', '||'광주사무소 : '||CNT2||', ' ||'부산사무소 : '||CNT3||', '||'서울센터 : '||CNT4||', ' ||'중앙민원사무소 : '||CNT5||', '||'수원사무소 : '||CNT6||', ' ||'대구사무소 : '||CNT7 AS CNT , CNT1, CNT2, CNT3, CNT4, CNT5, CNT6, CNT7 ,(CNT1+ CNT2+ CNT3 + CNT4) as SUM_CNT ,(CNT1+ CNT2+ CNT3+ CNT4+ CNT5+ CNT6+ CNT7) AS TOTAL_CNT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#strDt#), 'MM') AS MM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#strDt#), 'DD') AS DD FROM (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '062500' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '062800' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS CNT2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '062600' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '071110' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '071100' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '071300' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '062700' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT7 FROM TBCSPDCP101M D2 ,(SELECT * FROM TBCSPDCP202H D1 WHERE HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND (D1.REQ_DVSN_CD, D1.ACP_YR, D1.CVPT_ACP_NO,D1.CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) IN (SELECT S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO,MIN(CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP202H S1 WHERE S1.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL GROUP BY S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO) ) D1 WHERE D2.REQ_DVSN_CD = '1' AND D2.REQ_DVSN_CD = D1.REQ_DVSN_CD AND D2.ACP_YR = D1.ACP_YR AND D2.CVPT_ACP_NO = D1.CVPT_ACP_NO AND TO_CHAR(D1.FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYYMMDD') = #strDt# AND D1.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL
AND D2.ACP_DPT_CD IN ('071100','071110')
AND D2.ACP_DPT_CD IN ('071100','071110')
AND D2.ACP_DPT_CD = #strDPT_CD#
AND (D1.REQ_DVSN_CD, D1.ACP_YR, D1.CVPT_ACP_NO,D1.CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) IN (SELECT S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO,MIN(CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) FROM TBCSPDCP202H S1 WHERE S1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD IN ('20','30') AND TO_CHAR(S1.FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYYMMDD') = #strDt# AND S1.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL
AND S1.DTB_DPT_CD IN ('071100','071110')
AND S1.DTB_DPT_CD IN ('071100','071110')
AND S1.DTB_DPT_CD = #strDPT_CD#
GROUP BY S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO) )

SELECT '파일다운' AS FILE_DOWN ,D1.ATT_FL_URL_AD FROM TBCSPDCP106L D1 WHERE D1.REQ_DVSN_CD = #REQ_DVSN_CD# AND D1.ACP_YR = #ACP_YR# AND D1.CVPT_ACP_NO = #CVPT_ACP_NO# AND TRIM(D1.ATT_FL_URL_AD) IS NOT NULL
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO T_IC_TARGET_SRC_INTERFACE ( INTERFACE_KEY ,APP_ORGAN_CODE /*최초 민원 신청 기관코드(GCC)*/ ,PETI_NO /*민원신청번호*/ ,REC_SEQ /*분류이력일련번호*/ ,CIVIL_NO /*민원접수번호*/ ,PETI_GUBUN /*민원구분 (500고정,담당자부서지정) */ ,CANCEL_STATUS /*민원취하여부(Default N)*/ ,PCD_DEPT /*GCC 부서코드 (접수부서코드)*/ ,PCD_DEPT_NM /*GCC 부서명 (접수부서명)*/ ,PCD_DUTY_ID /*접수자명*/ ,PCD_EMAIL /*접수 이메일 (대표이메일 사용, 감청국, 센터 로 분류)*/ ,PCD_TEL /*접수자 전화번호 (대표전화 사용: 감청국, 센터로 분류)*/ ,PCD_ORGAN_CODE /*실처리기관코드 (감사원 GCC 코드로 고정)*/ ,SRCORGCD /*소스기관코드 (감사원 GCC 코드로 고정)*/ ,TGTORGCD /*타겟기관코드 (신문고 GCC 코드로 고정)*/ ,WRITE_TIME /*등록일자*/ ,SND_RCV_GUBUN /*송수신구분 (1:송신, 2:수신)*/ ,SND_RCV_TIME /*송수신일자*/ ,SEND_YN /*송신여부 (N DEFAULT, EAI 가 송신후 Y로 변경함)*/ ) SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF2') || LPAD(ROUND(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(1, 999999999)), 9, '0') ,SMG_FRT_CVPT_APL_GCC_ORG_CD ,SMG_CVPT_APL_NO ,SMG_CAT_HST_SRNO ,SMG_CVPT_ACP_NO ,'500' ,'N' ,F_DPT_INFO(#HNDL_DPT_CD#,'6') ,F_DPT_INFO(#HNDL_DPT_CD#,'7') ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(#HNDL_CHGR_ID#,'2') ,'' ,'02-2011-2191' ,'1040000' ,'1040000' ,'1140100' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ,'1' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,'N' FROM TBCSPDCP101M WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = #REQ_DVSN_CD# AND ACP_YR = #ACP_YR# AND CVPT_ACP_NO = #CVPT_ACP_NO#
